articles.author: Lim Hui Jie
articles.title: Asia markets mixed at open as investors await Big Tech earnings - CNBC
articles.description: Asian markets fall as investors await Big Tech earnings out from Wall Street
articles.content:
Hong Kong markets led losses in Asia on Tuesday, with the Hang Seng sliding 1.97% as Asian stocks largely fell ahead of earnings from Big Tech firms.
The Hang Seng Tech index saw a larger loss, tumb… [+961 chars]
